projects.title: SafeStranger
projects.description: Real-time anonymous chat and video matching platform built with WebRTC and a custom signaling server, featuring NSFW.js for live video moderation and an efficient pool-based matching algorithm.

projects.title: noWaitz
projects.description: MERN-based web app for booking service slots at local shops, featuring Google OAuth, Razorpay payments, email confirmations, and an admin panel.

projects.title: EFAT - Eco Feasibility Tool
projects.description: A platform to assess startup eco-friendliness by checking parameters like energy use and waste, offering NLP-driven insights and AI-based recommendations to improve environmental sustainability

projects.title: Personal Financial Visualiser
projects.description: A dashboard to visualize & track your finance according to the vis

projects.title: Nyaauta
projects.description: Web platform for managing digital invitations with card categories and employee controls. Includes design tools and bulk email delivery.
